text: Hey everyone. Has anyone created an import process to pull content into HUBDB on a regular basis from a json feed? Any existing rows would need to be updated in Hubdb, not deleted and re-added (I plan to use the hubdb table to manually curate a list of employees in a module). Is this possible?
cc <@U02J1440N13> you implemented something similar recently?

Hello <@U01UD8W2CLV> <@U9KA594Q3>,

In my scenario, i am fetching data from my BE to my hubdb on daily bases using a scheduler in my BE that runs on daily basis, but i am deleting the data every day after i finish using it. I send a webhook that triggers a function in BE that will delete the data.
This scenario runs daily
